articles.author: David Chau
articles.title: Markets live update: ASX sinks to two-month low as property prices fall 5.3pc - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian share market wipes out all its gains since early November, despite strong overnight gains across European markets, while property prices suffer their biggest annual fall since the global financial crisis in 2008.
articles.content:
2022 was not a great year for Australian house prices (from an owner's perspective at least).
The nation's median value fell 5.3% last year the biggest annual drop since the financial crisis in 2008… [+864 chars]

articles.title: World steps into 2023 after turbulent year - GMA News Online
articles.description: The world's eight billion people have been ushering in 2023, bidding farewell to a turbulent year marked by war in Europe, stinging price rises, Lionel Messi's World Cup glory and the deaths of Queen Elizabeth, Pele and former pope Benedict.
